lines.text: Hey [REDACTED]. Something just came up.
lines.name: gv0042

lines.text: What is it private?
lines.name: TMG007

lines.text: Y'know that kid who keeps tearing through our shit?
lines.name: gv0042

lines.text: Yes of course I know that fuckin' kid. EVERYONE knows about that little shit, what about him?
lines.name: TMG007

lines.text: I think he got in the prison hall.
lines.name: gv0042

lines.text: Umm...okay? What the fuck about it?
lines.name: TMG007

lines.text: I think he's talkin' to...you-know-who. And I think they're tryin' to manipulate him into freeing him...
lines.name: gv0042

lines.text: Wait...WHAT THE FUCK?!
lines.name: TMG007

lines.text: ...Okay...calm down private...We know that the kid is pretty smart...
lines.name: TMG007

lines.text: I mean- He outsmarted Lucy...fuckin' Lucy...
lines.name: TMG007

lines.text: Well...yeah but- ...[REDACTED] is wayyyyy smarter...just sayin' sir.
lines.name: gv0042

lines.text: *sigh*....just...just...keep your fucking hopes up private. pray to Deprai that...that he dosen't fall for the trick...
lines.name: TMG007

lines.text: Sir yes sir.
lines.name: gv0042

lines.text: SWITCHING AUDIO SOURCE TO PRISON HALL 3, CELL 000...
lines.name: [SYS]

lines.text: So...you want to help me kill [DECEASED LEADER]...but only if I free you?
lines.name: [WANTED KID]

lines.text: YES, YES!! I'LL HELP YOU NOW!!! JUST B[RRRRRRRRRRRR]EAK THE SEAL.
lines.name: [REDACTED]

lines.text: Okay...you promise that you won't try to kill me?
lines.name: [WANTED KID]

lines.text: What?! NO! I would [NEVER] betray a [FRIEND].
lines.name: [REDACTED]

lines.text: Huh?...But I've been talking to you for two minutes...
lines.name: [WANTED KID]

lines.text: Anyone who wants to [HELP ME] is a friend...
lines.name: [REDACTED]

lines.text: A cannot thank you enough...friend...Together, we shall overthrow [DECEASED LEADER]...
lines.name: [REDACTED]

lines.text: CELL 3-0000 OPENED.
lines.name: PRISON HALL INTERCOM 3-1

lines.text: Uhhhhh...Yeah, no sweat...
lines.name: [WANTED KID]

lines.text: ...*Laughing* Firstly...
lines.name: [REDACTED]

lines.text: WANNA KNOW WHAT THIS ROOM WOULD LOOK LIKE WITH YOUR INSIDES ALL OVER IT?
lines.name: [REDACTED]
